entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:02 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 7:00 AM EST Friday 21 April 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %

Wind: NE 15 km/h gust 33 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:54 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:54 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
